query.description: 根据name和id动态查询操作员
动态插入操作员信息，支持各字段为空判断
query.sql: INSERT INTO operator ( operatorid, operatorname, operatorsex, operatorbirthdate, responsibility, operatortel, operatormail, idnumber, createtime, updatetime, flag, isdel ) VALUES ( {{if operatorid}}#{operatorid}{{else}}NULL{{/if}}, {{if operatorname}}#{operatorname}{{else}}NULL{{/if}}, {{if operatorsex}}#{operatorsex}{{else}}NULL{{/if}}, {{if operatorbirthdate}}#{operatorbirthdate}{{else}}NULL{{/if}}, {{if responsibility}}#{responsibility}{{else}}NULL{{/if}}, {{if operatortel}}#{operatortel}{{else}}NULL{{/if}}, {{if operatormail}}#{operatormail}{{else}}NULL{{/if}}, {{if idnumber}}#{idnumber}{{else}}NULL{{/if}}, {{if createtime}}#{createtime}{{else}}NOW(){{/if}}, {{if updatetime}}#{updatetime}{{else}}NOW(){{/if}}, {{if flag != null}}#{flag}{{else}}0{{/if}}, {{if isdel != null}}#{isdel}{{else}}0{{/if}} )
